full_summary:
## Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada Workload Migration (WLM) Services

**Tender Notice**

**Reference**: cb-790-20551226
**Publication Date**: November 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: November 29, 2024, 14:00 EST

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking the services of an experienced Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) professional to assist with workload migration and application modernization efforts. The contract is intended to be an "as and when requested" basis, requiring the selected supplier to provide resources to support the Information Systems Branch's (ISB) requirements.

**Requirements**

* Provide experienced IM/IT professional resources to consult, develop, implement, and support the departmental application modernization and workload migration efforts.
* Collaborate with ISB to identify and resolve technical issues related to these efforts.

**Services**

* Consultation and advisory services
* Development and implementation of departmental applications
* Documentation and support for workload migration efforts

**Contract Details**

* Contract duration: Initial contract term plus three (3) one-year options
* Contract start date: January 1, 2025
* Contract end date: March 31, 2026

**Notice Details**

* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other applicable trade agreements.
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Retainer Services**

This tender is being released under a TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services) Supply Arrangement (SA). The contracted supplier will be required to provide resources on an "as and when requested" basis.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**

* Eligibility: Suppliers must be registered under a TBIPS SA to respond to this tender.
* Selection Criteria: Suppliers will be evaluated on their experience and expertise in delivering workload migration and application modernization services.

**Contact Information**

* Name: Kyle Harrington
* Email: [kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca](mailto:kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca)
* Phone: 5555555

**Tender Documents**

The tender documents are available for download on Canada Buys: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51756/01b68-23-0773-npp-tbips-english
